title: Test coverage of default behaviour of item culture in dotnet 9
body:
### Context
The change: https://github.com/dotnet/sdk/pull/41042 was tested manually enabling the default behaviour in .net 9 of the change https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/10026 was merged. 

Even it is coverd by unit testing in MSBuild, we still need to ensure the e2e verification to be part of the PR gates for future checkins.

### Goal
To cover the behavior by automated testing in SDK repository to freeze the behaviour and avoid breaking in future.
